data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Earnings Call Transcript
data.news_body: This is further to the intimations done by the Company on 28th Jan 2026 4th Feb 2026 and 5th Feb 2026 with respect to the Result Conference Call hosted by the management of our company on 5th Feb 2026 at 10 am(IST) to discuss the Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the quarter ended 31st Dec 2025. The transcript of the conference call has been uploaded on our website.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Analyst / Investor Meet - Outcome
data.news_body:
This is further to the intimations done by the Company on 28th January 2026 and 4th February 2026 with respect to the Result Conference Call hosted by the Management of our Company on Thursday 5th February 2026 at 10:00 a.m. (Indian Standard Time) to discuss the Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the quarter ended 31st December 2025. 

The audio recording of the Conference Call has been uploaded on our website at https://www.jswcement.in/financial-results-data.php.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Investor Presentation
data.news_body: Please find attached herewith presentation being made to Investor/ Analyst on the financial results for the quarter and nine months ended 31st December 2025.

data.caption: Outcome Of The Board Meeting - Unaudited Standalone And Consolidated Financial Results Of The Company For The Quarter Ended 31St December 2025 (Unaudited Financial Results)
data.news_body:
Pursuant to the applicable provisions of SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015 please find enclosed herewith:

i. Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results for the quarter ended 31st December 2025 and
ii. Limited Review Report dated 4th February 2026 issued by Statutory Auditors of the Company with respect to the Unaudited Financial Results and taken on record by the Board of Directors of the Company.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Investor Presentation
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 we are enclosing herewith an Investor Presentation.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Analyst / Investor Meet - Outcome
data.news_body:
This is further to the intimations done by the Company on 31st October 2025 and 7th November 2025 with respect to the Result Conference Call hosted by the Management of
our Company on Monday 10th November 2025 at 10:00 a.m. (Indian Standard Time) to discuss the Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the
quarter and half year ended 30th September 2025.
The audio recording of the Conference Call has been uploaded on our website at https://www.jswcement.in/financial-results-data.php.

data.caption: Outcome Of The Board Meeting Held On 7Th November 2025 Of JSW Cement Limited
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 pf the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 we hereby inform you that the Board of Directors at its meeting held today has  inter-alia approved the unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results for the Quarter and Half year ended 30th September 2025.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Analyst / Investor Meet - Outcome
data.news_body:
This is further to the intimations done by the Company on 29th August 2025 and 3rd September 2025 with respect to the Result Conference Call hosted by the Management of 
our Company on Wednesday 3rd September 2025 at 11:00 a.m. (Indian Standard Time) to discuss the Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the quarter ended 30th June 2025. 
The audio recording of the Conference Call has been uploaded on our website at https://www.jswcement.in/financial-results-data.php. 

Kindly take the same on record.

data.caption: Unaudited Standalone And Consolidated Financial Results Of The Company For The Quarter Ended 30Th June 2025
data.news_body: Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the quarter ended 30th June 2025 have been enclosed herewith.
